t: Amazon disavows $500 ‘Prime Bike,’ says it has no formal connection to the product | The Verge
s: September 23, 2020 - Amazon has disavowed a $500 “Prime Bike” launched by Echelon Fitness, saying it has no formal connection to the product. News of the bike’s launch earlier this week sent the stock price of Peleton tumbling, as traders anticipated Amazon’s entry into the growing home exercise market.
